attributes.additional_details:
Rename all prisons "hospitals" in line with text book definitions of mental illness that includes ALL criminal behaviour. Lets condemn criminals via the mental health statutory provisions.

This is in order to justify long term sedation - switch off their sick brains before they mess up other people.
